welcome-message: On this site, you change the colour for our christmas tree's electric lights. Send us a holiday card, pick a color, and send it ! When we receive your message, the lights on our tree will blink and take the color you've chosen.
use-the-slide-to-pick-a-color: Use the slider to pick a color:
thanks-message: We just received your message and our connected christmas tree's lights are blinking right now! If you wan't to learn how it's done, this website source code is available on github.
